archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.4.1a: a) approved methods of building systems (e.g. defining competence levels for staff writing or reviewing code, customising software packages, and documenting changes)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
